name: 2D Platform Game
description:
Objective:  Kill all Boss Zombies in the level to obtain the key that open the next level! Controls:  PlayerGameVolume Movement:  A | D

 Jump: Space

 Shoot: Left Button Mouse | K

 Meele Attack: Right Button Mouse | LPause/Resume: P

Start Game: I

Restart Game: EnterMaster Volume: 1 | 2

Music Volume: 3 | 4

SFX Volume: 5 | 6

Volume Off/On: 9 | 0  Player

 

Player Attacks

 

Player Bullet Zombies Female Zombie || Male Zombie || Boss Zombie Boss Melee Attack

 

Male Zombie Projectile || Boss Zombie Projectile    Bat

 

Bat Projectile Bonus
